gen:link.msg:message: De gerapporteerde waarde van `RevaluationReserve` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `RevaluationReserveMovement`, omdat `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` gerapporteerd wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PrecondRevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in De gerapporteerde waarde van `RevaluationReserve` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `RevaluationReserve` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `RevaluationReserveMovement`, omdat `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` niet gerapporteerd wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ERevaluationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ERevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SRevaluationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SRevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RevaluationReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RevaluationReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `RevaluationReserve` + `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` - `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPoliciesTaxImpact`, omdat `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` gerapporteerd wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_PrecondRevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies')))) (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_RevaluationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_RevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', `AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen binnen dezelfde context, omdat `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` wordt gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RecognisedDirectlyThroughEquityMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RecognisedDirectlyThroughEquityMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RevaluationReserveMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RevaluationReserveMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RevaluationReserveMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_RevaluationReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_RevaluationReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RevaluationReserve` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis` en `RevaluationReserveMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `RevaluationReserve` zonder `ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis` en `RevaluationReserveMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRevaluationReserveStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
